title: Thalangama OIC transferred
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The OIC of the Thalangama Police was transferred with immediate effect on Wednesday (25).
A Senior Police Officer said the OIC was moved to the Mount Lavinia Police Division.
At the same time, SSP A. J. Kodithuwakku was appointed as the SSP in-charge of the Seethawaka Division.
He was previously posted at the Police Headquarters in Colombo.

SLPP MPs Sanath Nishantha, Milan Jayathilake moved to court from remand custody
Interim budget within six weeks, says Prime Minister aiming to re-route funds for relief programs
PM Ranil Wickremesinghe sworn in as Sri Lanka’s new Finance Minister
